description: Similar in coverage to Chemistry 101. This course explores the basic concepts and principles of chemistry, with a greater emphasis on problem solving. It is designed for students with a lesser background in chemistry and/or mathe- matics. It is suitable for chemistry majors, non-majors, or preprofessional students.
name: INTRODUCTORY CHEM I

values.comments: Praise for Dr. Pietrovito was overwhelmingly positive. Students thought he was an excellent lecturer and showed equal devotion to the subject and to the students needs. Many students thought the course could have used an improved textbook or a more organized system of handouts.
